A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everything I wanted and more! So much more fresh\, complex\, and multifaceted than any Star Wars film. To me\, truly\, it is the best Star Wars to date. Perfectly balancing everything. Can’t wait for IX!!!!!!!!!! Rey and Kylo though were the two stars and scene stealers of the film for me. Their dynamic and interactions were enigmatic and electric. Can’t wait to see more of their dynamic played out in the next film. Goosebumps from seeing the film. Literally on the edge of my seat the whole time. Gonna see it again\, 3\, maybe 5 more times not lying.. 🔥🤤😍 GO SEE IT! MORE THAN ONCE. TO FULLY GRASP WHAT THE MOVIE IS AND TRYING TO DO. It’s so much more complex\, different\, refreshing\, and multifaceted. It’s bigger than anything we can possibly imagine 100%!!! Have already seen it 3 times and plan to again once I get the chance :)
